DESCRIPTIONS: Increase all numbers on cards in the Sequence by #b

bronze:CleanCodePotion.NAME: Alchyrical Elixir
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove all Compile *Error effects from the next Function you create.  Reduce its cost to #b0 until played.
